Name: Drops: Rhythm Garden
About the game: Drops is a gravity based musical instrument set in a serene environment and designed from the ground up for VR. Drops was built to provide a way for those with little or no musical background or training to create rich and expressive polyphonic rhythms. At the same time, it offers sophisticated customization abilities to those who want to fine tune their work. The initial release of Drops includes sets of shapes and sounds created in collaboration with noted electronic musician Patrick Russell and experimental composer Patrick Higgins.
